title: 成都科创空间智慧巡检系统(开发中)

location.format:
经度:{x}
纬度:{y}
海拔：{z}米
层级：{level}
方向：{heading}度
俯仰角：{pitch}度
视高：{height}米

operationallayers.name: 白模(蓝色)
operationallayers.marsJzwStyle: float stc_pl = fract(czm_frameNumber / 120.0) * 3.14159265 * 2.0;       float stc_sd = v_stcVertex.y / 100.0 + sin(stc_pl) * 0.1;                gl_FragColor *= vec4(stc_sd, stc_sd, stc_sd, 1.0);                   float stc_a13 = fract(czm_frameNumber / 360.0);                float stc_h = clamp(v_stcVertex.y / 50.0, 0.0, 1.0);                stc_a13 = abs(stc_a13 - 0.5) * 2.0;                float stc_diff = step(0.005, abs(stc_h - stc_a13));                gl_FragColor.rgb += gl_FragColor.rgb * (1.0 - stc_diff);
